TextBody:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to us.
Regarding the topic that you raised, I will add my colleagues from the Customer Success team to guide you further.
They will contact you starting tomorrow most likely, as today is an international holiday.
@Oana, please let us know after you've taken over and if we can close the ticket from the support side.

Have a nice day,
Best regards,
Alin Anca

Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix - DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
CoSoSys Ltd www.endpointprotector.com
